Text: Have you seen the one who denies the Day of Judgment?
He it is who drives away the orphan with harshness
and does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
So woe to those who offer Salah (prayers),
but are neglectful of their Salah (offer Prayers but disregard\n\t\t\tthe very purpose of establishing Salah - to have the fear of\n\t\t\tAllah and be mindful to the needs of other people);
those who make a show of piety
and refuse to share the necessities of life.
